overview: A young man gets involved in a traffic accident at midnight and is brought to the police station to be questioned. After getting the news, his mother and father immediately come to the police station. The father, who prevents his son from exhaling into the breathalyser, tries to save his son by using his clout. This night of fierce conflict between the mother, son, and the police officer ends with an unexpected incident.
title: The Dark Spot on the Road
